Bitex API Guides

Don't Panic: The Bitex.la API user guides and tutorials

The JSON-API Standard.

JSON-API is a standard format for RESTful API’s in a that allows for efficient modeling and retrieval of related resoruces.

Using JSON-API means that you can consume our API with any compatible JSON-API client library.

We even have Bitex specific wrappers for some languages in our GitHub repositories, that model all our API resources and relationships. We’ll gladly take requests for your favourite language.

If you are unable to use a JSON-API client library, our responses can be treated as regular JSON.
